Bielat confirms he's out of Senate race

Republican Sean Bielat, who has lost two recent races for US House seats, said today he won't seek to replace former US Senator John Kerry. (2:53 p.m.)

FBI releases files on Aaron Swartz

The agency today released 21 pages of files on Swartz, mostly focused on his work to put the federal court system’s PACER records online. (1:07 p.m.)
